transcript.text: I feel like I sound like a broken record
but I have to say this is just driving
me insane Michael Froman was with the
Clintons City he's sending a message to
John Podesta on the 28th of November in
2000 and attaches the cover memo we
discussed let me know if you have any
revisions or if you wanted to send it to
anyone else otherwise I'll assume you
said it to Pete at all with the agenda
timetable personnel discussion to
Senator Obama we are scheduled to see
you tomorrow in Reno to discuss White
House organization structure as well as
candidates for senior White House
national security and economic policy
positions our focus tomorrow will be the
chief of staff the national security
team and other core economic policy
teams at the meeting we'll provide you
with the list of names which includes
candidates deputies supporting staff
we'll also have available the public
vetting reports almost the candidates
for senior positions well we don't
necessarily expect you to make final
decisions as to appointments tomorrow
the objective of this meeting is to
narrow the list to those you wish to
serve in key posts understanding that
some candidates could serve in multiple
jobs this will allow the private vetting
process to begin and expedite the
potential appointments it will also
allow us to identify those candidates
you need to spend more time with before
making final decisions we did not have a
presidential election in 2008 Barack
Obama was chosen by the powers that be
we did not have a presidential election
in 2008 we did not have a presidential
election in 2008 I'm still true
to find the definitive message where
they say okay we've picked him and I
haven't been able to do that yet but I'm
gonna be searching earliest first this
is just disgusting and I I knew it was
true my entire adult life but the
interesting thing is now we do have an
election going on so what about 2008 was
special come on guys help me out here
